# vue-clock

> Simple clock component using Vue.js

![](screenshot.png)

## Install 

```shell
$ npm install @dangvanthanh/vue-clock --save
```

## Usage

```vue
<template>
  <div class="app">
    <vue-clock />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import VueClock from '@dangvanthanh/vue-clock';

export default {
  components: { VueClock }
}
</script>
```
